headline: Why Fashion CFOs Need to Pay Attention to ESG: Climate Risk Could Hit Profits
summary: Climate costs could cut apparel profits by a third by 2030 and two-thirds by 2040, according to a new Aii report, urging CFOs to factor supplier decarbonization into planning.

raw.headline: Why Fashion CFOs Need to Pay Attention to ESG: Climate Risk Could Hit Profits
raw.summary: Climate costs could cut apparel profits by a third by 2030 and two-thirds by 2040, according to a new Aii report, urging CFOs to factor supplier decarbonization into planning.

headline: Healthy Global Loan Issuance Volumes to Drive Moody's Q4 Earnings
summary: MCO heads into Feb. 18 earnings with healthy Q4 loan and bond issuance driving MIS growth, while Analytics demand and rising acquisition costs shape results.
